title: SLUMDOG!
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Yeah, yeah, teraz by chcieli być jak ja
lines.translation: Yeah, yeah, now they want to be like me
lines.grammar: Verbs: być. Prepositions/case: Check cases after preps (do+gen, z+gen, na/w for motion vs location).. Meaning: 'Yeah, yeah, now they want to be like me'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Nie raz nie robisz nic, jak ja
lines.translation: You don't do anything like me sometimes
lines.grammar: Verbs: robisz (present 2sg). Prepositions/case: Check cases after preps (do+gen, z+gen, na/w for motion vs location).. Meaning: 'You don't do anything like me sometimes'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Mieć sos i taki fit—

lines.text: Ej, ej, ej (yo)
lines.translation: Hey, hey, hey (yo)
lines.grammar: Verbs: Find the main verb and note its aspect (perfective vs imperfective).. Prepositions/case: Check cases after preps (do+gen, z+gen, na/w for motion vs location).. Meaning: 'Hey, hey, hey (yo)'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Dawaj mi klucze do miasta, bo jak wracam tam, to czuję się jak Slumdog
lines.translation: Give me the keys to the city, because when I go back there I feel like Slumdog Millionaire.
lines.grammar: Verbs: wracam (prefix w- hints perfective/directional) (present 1sg); tam (present 1sg). Prepositions/case: do + genitive for motion toward. Meaning: 'Give me the keys to the city, because when I go back there I feel like Slumdog Millionaire.'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Nie śmigam na pieszo, lecz z daleka słychać warkot
lines.translation: I'm not on foot, but I can hear the roar from afar
lines.grammar: Verbs: śmigam (present 1sg); słychać. Prepositions/case: na + accusative (motion) / locative (location); z/ze + genitive for "from/out of". Meaning: 'I'm not on foot, but I can hear the roar from afar'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Za mną kordon na rowerach i ktoś jedzie rafką
lines.translation: Behind me there is a cordon of bikes and someone is riding a raft
lines.grammar: Verbs: Find the main verb and note its aspect (perfective vs imperfective).. Prepositions/case: na + accusative (motion) / locative (location). Meaning: 'Behind me there is a cordon of bikes and someone is riding a raft'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Zatrzymują mnie na światłach i chcą fotkę — mówię: "bardzo proszę"
lines.translation: They stop me at a traffic light and want a photo - I say, "Please."
lines.grammar: Verbs: fotkę (1sg ending -ę); mówię (1sg ending -ę). Prepositions/case: na + accusative (motion) / locative (location). Meaning: 'They stop me at a traffic light and want a photo - I say, "Please."'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Wjeżdżam w tę alejkę, co łączy się z moim blokiem
lines.translation: I enter this alley that connects with my block
lines.grammar: Verbs: wjeżdżam (prefix w- hints perfective/directional) (present 1sg); alejkę (1sg ending -ę). Prepositions/case: w/we + locative for location, accusative for motion into; z/ze + genitive for "from/out of". Meaning: 'I enter this alley that connects with my block'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Idzie młody, a ja idę o stówę, że niesie koper (smoke)
lines.translation: Here comes the young one, and I bet he's carrying some smoke
lines.grammar: Verbs: idę (1sg ending -ę); stówę (1sg ending -ę). Prepositions/case: o + locative/accusative depending on phrase. Meaning: 'Here comes the young one, and I bet he's carrying some smoke'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Tam, gdzie po tej bibie spałem, zbudowali hotel
lines.translation: Where I slept after that party, they built a hotel
lines.grammar: Verbs: tam (present 1sg); spałem (past 1sg). Prepositions/case: po + locative/accusative depending on motion. Meaning: 'Where I slept after that party, they built a hotel'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Sprawdzam zmiany na osiedlu jak jebany deweloper (oh)
lines.translation: I'm checking the changes in the estate like a fucking developer (oh)
lines.grammar: Verbs: sprawdzam (present 1sg). Prepositions/case: na + accusative (motion) / locative (location). Meaning: 'I'm checking the changes in the estate like a fucking developer (oh)'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: I nas wyganiali z dachu, bo mieli to za głupotę
lines.translation: And they threw us off the roof because they thought it was stupid.

lines.text: Ale jak wyganiali mnie wtedy, nie wiedzieli, że jestem kotem
lines.translation: But when they were throwing me out, they didn't know I was a cat.

lines.text: Teraz ich dzieci do szkoły mówią: "mamo, proszę do tej"
